content: I am a PhD student in Computer Science at Tennessee Tech University. I work as a graudate research assistant under the supervision of Dr. Akond Rahman at the PASER Lab. My research interests include secure software development, software security and DevOps.
summary: I am a PhD student in Computer Science at Tennessee Tech University. I work as a graudate research assistant under the supervision of Dr. Akond Rahman at the PASER Lab. My research interests include secure software development, software security and DevOps.
title: Md Shazibul Islam Shamim
XI Commandments of Kubernetes Security: A Systematization of Knowledge Related to Kubernetes Security Practices
